title: Fps problem
body: before 6.22 my fps is in 122 above but after the update it keeps cap me in 60 fps so what can i do can get back regular fps ? (i didn't use the new client){{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} {{summoner:3}}

replies.body: Have you resolved your problem? I have had this problem since beta client update. Tried going back to legacy. Tried different drivers. I also know its the game because I play Overwatch on max settings and get 90fps. I have used gpu-z and noticed that when i play overwatch, my card is being used at 99% , when I play league. its at 30%

By update I'm guessing you mean updating your files for the updated client.  In this case, you could have bad game files during the installation or just bad drivers slowing you down.  To start, I recommend going over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up.  Hopefully that does the trick!  {{summoner:1}}

but my notebook is Alienware i dont think is my drivers problem 
sorry for the bad english
